  • Uses of RowUpdater in org.cojen.tupl

    Methods in org.cojen.tupl that return RowUpdater
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RowUpdater<R>
    Table.newRowUpdater(Transaction txn)
    Returns a new updater for all rows of this table.
    RowUpdater<R>
    Table.newRowUpdater(Transaction txn, String filter, Object... args)
    Returns a new updater for a subset of rows of this table, as specified by the filter expression.
